extension.name: Frontend Localisation Redirection
extension.description: Adds redirection capabilities to Frontend Localisation Extension

releases.release: - Fix problems when installing flang_redirection before frontend_localisation
- Added more validation of user input values - Fix problems with regions (update to frontend_localisation 2.7.0 required)
- Prevent crash when parsing browser languages
- Fixed a bug when the event was firing on the 404. The solution is to never fire the event if the page is in an erroneous state.
- Fixed the event author - Early exit when no default language is found - Removed two notice warnings
- Fixed a regression bug (#7): redirect event's about method has been deleted.
- Fixed bug when no '?' were presented in the reported query string value
- Update for Symphony 2.3.1 (For un-cdata the querystring) - Use REAL cookies (Since the cookie class does not do it)
